title: Bug 6656: Close button moves down when view resized smaller
description: The close button is not staying on the same line as the label when the view is resized smaller.
OB: When the view is resized smaller, the close button moves down to the next line.
EB: The close button should stay on the same line as the label nomatter how small the view gets.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Resize the view to a smaller size.
3. Observe that the close button moves down to the next line instead of staying on the same line as the label.
